title: Ticket #820: Add NETWORK_INTERFACE to condor_config.generic
description: /src/condor_examples/condor_config.generic doesn't have NETWORK_INTERFACE. It should probably appear there, commented out, with a comment explaining what the default is.
remarks:
This should go into the master.

Research the default out of the manual or source code. Make sure it lives in PART 2 in the config file and stick it after SANDBOX_TRANSFER_METHOD in the condor_config.generic file.
check_ins: 2010-Jul-01 11:27   Check-in [18541]: Added NETWORK_INTERFACE to condor_config.generic. #820 (By Josh Slauson )
creator: adesmet
